tweet_text: @PatriciaBrush @vetoshield @rynnovation1409 @nintendo6664 As someone who used to clean houses for a time, hard agree that this would have made me feel so much better. What a nice gesture. I once had a house where the lady would leave out peaches with a note saying they were for us. That was something I always remember as very kind.
